name: Wardrobe
description: A divorced woman, burdened with caring for her wheelchair-dependent mother in her 80s, can only work part-time. Besides, she needs to support her 16-year-old son who is still studying and another son who is still in NS. Living in a rental flat with limited space housing four people requires an additional wardrobe, but their low-income status makes it unaffordable. They hope donors can provide any form wardrobe. Due to size constraints, Please WhatsApp messages Hsin Yu at 8911 8058 or email to hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg beforehand. Would appreciate if donor can cover transport costs.

name: Baby Cot
description: Family has 3 preschool children, with father as the sole breadwinner. Mother is currently pregnant with her 4th child and is due to give birth in a month. Financial income is limited as it is dependent on father's, while father also has to take no pay leave occasionally to help with caregiving duties when children fall sick. To prepare for upcoming birth, family needs a baby cot to ensure safe sleeping arrangements for newborn. It will greatly benefit them to save on financial expenses too. If you have any baby cot to bless, do contact me at 8940 7451! Thank you (:
